MadeiraCloud (BEIJING, FULLTIME, DEVELOPERS)

MadeiraCloud are a venture backed (announcement coming soon) startup creating a better way to manage and visualise cloud infrastructure. We created the world's first drag and drop GUI for designing distributed architecture, with a single click to provision to AWS. We launched in a Show HN earlier this year and aim to come out of of beta by the end of the year.

We need front-end and back-end developers and are considering US based marketers too.

Get in touch -> dan@mc2.io
